接口的使用
org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamSource

  • 使用InputStreamSource的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.core.io
    Generic abstraction for (file-based) resources, used throughout the framework.
    org.springframework.core.io.support
    Support classes for Spring's resource abstraction.
    org.springframework.mail.javamail
    JavaMail support for Spring's mail infrastructure.
    org.springframework.mock.web
    A comprehensive set of Servlet API 3.0 mock objects, targeted at usage with Spring's Web MVC framework.
    org.springframework.web.context.support
    Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations and various utility classes.
    org.springframework.web.multipart
    Multipart resolution framework for handling file uploads.
    org.springframework.web.multipart.commons
    MultipartResolver implementation for Apache Commons FileUpload.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.resource
    Support classes for serving static resources.

    • org.springframework.core.io中InputStreamSource的使用

      org.springframework.core.io中InputStreamSource的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  ContextResource
      Extended interface for a resource that is loaded from an enclosing 'context', e.g. from a ServletContext but also from plain classpath paths or relative file system paths (specified without an explicit prefix, hence applying relative to the local ResourceLoader's context).
      interface  Resource
      Interface for a resource descriptor that abstracts from the actual type of underlying resource, such as a file or class path resource.
      interface  WritableResource
      Extended interface for a resource that supports writing to it.
      实现InputStreamSource的org.springframework.core.io中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractFileResolvingResource
      Abstract base class for resources which resolve URLs into File references, such as UrlResource or ClassPathResource.
      class  AbstractResource
      Convenience base class for Resource implementations, pre-implementing typical behavior.
      class  ByteArrayResource
      Resource implementation for a given byte array.
      class  ClassPathResource
      Resource implementation for class path resources.
      protected static class  DefaultResourceLoader.ClassPathContextResource
      ClassPathResource that explicitly expresses a context-relative path through implementing the ContextResource interface.
      class  DescriptiveResource
      Simple Resource implementation that holds a resource description but does not point to an actually readable resource.
      class  FileSystemResource
      Resource implementation for java.io.File and java.nio.file.Path handles with a file system target.
      class  FileUrlResource
      Subclass of UrlResource which assumes file resolution, to the degree of implementing the WritableResource interface for it.
      class  InputStreamResource
      Resource implementation for a given InputStream.
      class  PathResource
      已过时。 
      as of 5.1.1, in favor of FileSystemResource.FileSystemResource(Path)
      class  UrlResource
      Resource implementation for java.net.URL locators.
      class  VfsResource
      JBoss VFS based Resource implementation.

    • org.springframework.core.io.support中InputStreamSource的使用

      实现InputStreamSource的org.springframework.core.io.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  EncodedResource
      Holder that combines a Resource descriptor with a specific encoding or Charset to be used for reading from the resource.

    • org.springframework.mail.javamail中InputStreamSource的使用

      参数类型为InputStreamSource的org.springframework.mail.javamail中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void MimeMessageHelper.addAttachment(java.lang.String attachmentFilename, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource)
      Add an attachment to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamResource.
      void MimeMessageHelper.addAttachment(java.lang.String attachmentFilename, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource, java.lang.String contentType)
      Add an attachment to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamResource.
      void MimeMessageHelper.addInline(java.lang.String contentId, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource, java.lang.String contentType)
      Add an inline element to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.springframework.core.InputStreamResource, and specifying the content type explicitly.
      protected DataSource MimeMessageHelper.createDataSource(InputStreamSource inputStreamSource, java.lang.String contentType, java.lang.String name)
      Create an Activation Framework DataSource for the given InputStreamSource.

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  MockMultipartFile
      Mock implementation of the MultipartFile interface.

    • org.springframework.web.context.support中InputStreamSource的使用

      实现InputStreamSource的org.springframework.web.context.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ServletContextResource
      Resource implementation for ServletContext resources, interpreting relative paths within the web application root directory.

    • org.springframework.web.multipart中InputStreamSource的使用

      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  MultipartFile
      A representation of an uploaded file received in a multipart request.

    • org.springframework.web.multipart.commons中InputStreamSource的使用

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中InputStreamSource的使用

      org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中InputStreamSource的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  HttpResource
      Extended interface for a Resource to be written to an HTTP response.
      实现InputStreamSource的org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  TransformedResource
      An extension of ByteArrayResource that a ResourceTransformer can use to represent an original resource preserving all other information except the content.
